testcase.name: guard-rules-registry-all-rules.guard
testcase.failure: Guard Rule Set: guard-rules-registry-all-rules Controls: all rules in AWS Guard Rules Registry Violation: Bucket policies must feature a statement to enforce TLS usage. Fix: Set a bucket policy statement to '"Action":"s3:*","Effect":"Deny","Principal":"*","Resource":"*","Condition":{"Bool":{"aws:SecureTransport":false}}' . Check was not compliant as property value [Path=/Resources/ObjectStorageBucketPolicyPolicy/Properties/PolicyDocument/Statement/0[L:50,C:12] Value={"Action":"s3:*","Condition":{"Bool":{"aws:SecureTransport":false}},"Effect":"Deny","Principal":{"AWS":"*"},"Resource":[{"Fn::Sub":"arn:${AWS::Partition}:s3:::${BucketName}-${AWS::Region}-${AWS::AccountId}"},{"Fn::Sub":"arn:${AWS::Partition}:s3:::${BucketName}-${AWS::Region}-${AWS::AccountId}/*"}]}] not equal to value [Path=[L:0,C:0] Value={"Action":"s3:*","Effect":"Deny","Principal":"*","Resource":"*","Condition":{"Bool":{"aws:SecureTransport":false}}}]. Error = [PathAwareValues are not comparable map, String] Guard Rule Set: guard-rules-registry-all-rules Controls: all rules in AWS Guard Rules Registry Violation: Bucket policies must feature a statement to enforce TLS usage. Fix: Set a bucket policy statement to '"Action":"s3:*","Effect":"Deny","Principal":"*","Resource":"*","Condition":{"Bool":{"aws:SecureTransport":false}}' .
